ComicInfo.Summary:
It’s danger in the air in Kingdom: Aux Drift by Dan Abnett, Richard Elson and Abigail Ryder in this week’s 2000 AD! Also in this issue of the Galaxy’s Greatest Comic: Block Judge by John Wagner and Carlos Ezquerra, Stickleback: The Thru’Penny Opera by Ian Edginton and D'Israeli, Greysuit by Pat Mills, John Higgins, and Sally Hurst, and Ichabod Azrael: One Last Bullet by Rob Williams and Mike Dowling.
Cover: John Higgins
Judge Dredd - Block Judge (Part Eight) (John Wagner - Carlos Ezquerra)Stickleback - The Thru'Penny Opera (Part Eight) (Ian Edginton - D'Israeli)Greysuit - Prince of Darkness (Part Seven) (Pat Mills - John Higgins)The Grievous Journey of Ichabod Azrael (And the Dead Left In His Wake) - One Last Bullet (Part Seven) (Rob Williams - Michael Dowling)Kingdom - Aux Drift (Part Eight) (Dan Abnett - Richard Elson)
ComicInfo.Title: Prog 1907
ComicInfo.Writer: Dan Abnett,Ian Edginton,John Wagner,Pat Mills,Rob Williams
